patches.name: Chord Progression

patches.name: Funky Beat
patches.description: A funky beat created using expr~ for audio-rate mathematical expressions

patches.name: Drum Sequencer
patches.description: Interactive drum sequencer. Use P to play and K to stop

patches.name: FM Synth
patches.description: Uses osc~, expr, gain~, and fft~ to create a simple FM synth.

patches.name: ChucK the Fourth
patches.description: ChucK composition with arp, melody, kick drum, bassline & feedback delay

patches.name: Matter.js Physics Simulation
patches.description: Physics simulation ported from Daniel Shiffman's The Nature of Code. Demonstrates shared JavaScript libraries across multiple objects

patches.name: Assembly Stack Machine
patches.description: Example assembly patch demonstrating the virtual stack machine with color-coded memory visualization
